title: 490. What Do Broken-Hearted Knitters, Urinating Goalkeepers, and the C.I.A. Have in Common?
description: Curses and other superstitions may have no basis in reality, but that doesn’t stop us from believing.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
